posts.post_title: T206 Cobb bat off SGC 1 - sold

posts.post_content:
Private Message Sent... Thanks for your consideration.
Tim Kindler

Jay, 
Thanks again for a flawless transaction on the BST..... This completes my Cobb run of T206 and the purple sun in the background (ink spot) doesn't even bother me!!!! It's still a beautiful card to me!
Thanks again, would do business again  anytime!
Tim Kindler
